headline.main: Congo Opposition Party Expels Top Official in Sign of Infighting
headline.print_headline: Congo Opposition Party Expels Top Official in Sign of Infighting

lead_paragraph: Democratic Republic of Congo's largest opposition party said it expelled one of its leaders on Saturday amid infighting that weakens its effort to force President Joseph Kabila to stick to a deal to step down after an election this year.
snippet: Democratic Republic of Congo's largest opposition party said it expelled one of its leaders on Saturday amid infighting that weakens its effort to force President Joseph Kabila to stick to a deal to step down after an election this year....
